# Monoform

![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/37647466/389731638-acb37297-1790-4e95-892a-528bf47d6b08.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..7qoJTYyfLjTszRV-W_kXsw6uc7PNApkppMdmOtD7C88)

## Overview
Monoform is an open-source form-builder app with:
- Markdown integration
- Clean and intuitive UI
- Seamless autosaving capabilities
- Mobile-web support
- Increasing flexibility

## Technologies used
- Next.JS 14
- Drizzle ORM
- Neon DB Serverless HTTP
- Neon DB Websocket Pooling
- Resend
- Lucia
- shadcn UI
- Tailwind CSS
- React Hook Form

## Supported Features

### Block Types
- Markdown header blocks
- Multiple choice (choose one)
- Checkbox (choose multiple)

### Current Builder Features
- Marking an entry as required
- Organizing forms into sections
- Re-ordering blocks

## Future steps
### Checklist roadmap
- [X] Adding workspace dashboard
- [X] Form builder to add and modify questions
- [X] Public-facing form page
- [ ] Creating a responses tab with history and statistics
- [ ] Integrating with OAuth providers
- [ ] Adding a home page
